html: April marks #SecondChanceMonth! Recidivism rates in the United States are too high, which is why I supported the #FirstStepAct. We are a nation that believes in second chances. Safer communities come when we rehabilitate, rather than incarcerate.
text: April marks #SecondChanceMonth! Recidivism rates in the United States are too high, which is why I supported the #FirstStepAct. We are a nation that believes in second chances. Safer communities come when we rehabilitate, rather than incarcerate.

html: Minnesota is not immune to our nation’s suicide crisis. Rates in our state have risen ~40 % in the last 20 years. For young Minnesotans 15-34, suicide is the 2nd leading cause of death. Every step towards turning the tide counts. Proud to co-sponsor H.R. 2345.pic.twitter.com/yUR9FQ43tV
text: Minnesota is not immune to our nation’s suicide crisis. Rates in our state have risen ~40 % in the last 20 years. For young Minnesotans 15-34, suicide is the 2nd leading cause of death. Every step towards turning the tide counts. Proud to co-sponsor H.R. 2345.pic.twitter.com/yUR9FQ43tV

html: CFPB’s “double the data” rule is not just ineffective and costly, it also poses a threat to Americans’ privacy and data security. We must pass #HMDAA to give relief to Main Street banks and credit unions in Minnesota and across the country.
text: CFPB’s “double the data” rule is not just ineffective and costly, it also poses a threat to Americans’ privacy and data security. We must pass #HMDAA to give relief to Main Street banks and credit unions in Minnesota and across the country.

html: Due to the increased cost of compliance with the CFPB’s “double the data” rule – an estimated additional $326 million - many small banks in Minnesota are reconsidering their ability to continue to make mortgages and other covered loans. #HMDAA
text: Due to the increased cost of compliance with the CFPB’s “double the data” rule – an estimated additional $326 million - many small banks in Minnesota are reconsidering their ability to continue to make mortgages and other covered loans. #HMDAA

html: Over the years the 1975 Home Mortgage Disclosure Act has expanded away from its original intent (to eliminate discriminatory lending). Dodd-Frank’s CFPB created a rule in 2015 to move it even further - requiring more than DOUBLE the data required to be reported. #HMDAA
text: Over the years the 1975 Home Mortgage Disclosure Act has expanded away from its original intent (to eliminate discriminatory lending). Dodd-Frank’s CFPB created a rule in 2015 to move it even further - requiring more than DOUBLE the data required to be reported. #HMDAA

html: Some laws have proven helpful to Americans who want a chance at the American Dream. Others have created obstacles by codifying government overreach. #HMDAA
text: Some laws have proven helpful to Americans who want a chance at the American Dream. Others have created obstacles by codifying government overreach. #HMDAA

html: On National App Day, and at the close of this year's Congressional App Challenge, I am happy to acknowledge the importance of coding skills! Coding and STEM skills are the future of our workforce and I am glad students across my district are becoming proficient in these areas!
